revised_title: Redetermination of the Atomic Weight of Strontium
tldr: The authors redetermine the atomic weight of strontium by analyzing the ratios of silver to strontium bromide and strontium chloride. They use a systematic recrystallization process to purify the materials and a precise balance to weigh the substances. The results contribute to the understanding of atomic weights and the accuracy of modern atomic weight estimations.
